issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Replace ConstantPartitionScheme with PrefixDictionaryPartitionScheme
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7069](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7069). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ConstantPartitionScheme is not very useful, it'd be better to provide a dictionary of prefixes which maps to provided partition expressions
